programme.title: F1 2025: The Story So Far
programme.desc: It's a first Grand Prix pole for Oscar Piastri as George Russell splits the McLarens with Lando Norris starting third. Sprint winner Lewis Hamilton comes from fifth on the grid. (23.03)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Wild Thing: The guys check out a fighter plane flown in WWII. Plus, nostalgia strikes Rick when a 1974 VW Thing cruises by. Will his feelings affect his negotiating skills? (S8, ep 18)

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Zoodoo: The guys question the value of a can of joke elephant manure and check out some signed presidential memoirs and a robot toy from the movie Forbidden Planet. (S8, ep 19)

programme.title: River Hunters

programme.title: River Hunters

programme.title: Book Of Secrets With Lance Reddick

programme.title: Book Of Secrets With Lance Reddick

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files
programme.desc: Crime and Punishment: Explore the extreme punishments commonly used in ancient Egypt by homicidal royalty. (S2, ep 3)

programme.title: Egypt's Unexplained Files

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: (1987) Classic 80s dystopian thriller, based on a Stephen King novel. Gadget-wielding murderers hunt an innocent man (Arnold Schwarzenegger) on a sick TV show.

programme.title: Sicario 2: Soldado
programme.desc: (2018) Action sequel with Benicio Del Toro and Josh Brolin. Two operatives must create a gang war to stop Mexican drug cartels smuggling terrorists into the US.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Swimmer
programme.desc: (1968) Burt Lancaster stars as the angst-ridden middle-aged man who decides to swim home via neighbour's pools in Frank and Eleanor Perry's superb allegorical drama.

programme.title: The Sheriff of Fractured Jaw
programme.desc: (1959) Comedy western with Kenneth More. An English gunsmith decides the Wild West is the best market for his wares, but little does he expect to end up sheriff of a lawless frontier town.

programme.title: Fire Down Below
programme.desc: (1957) Drama with Rita Hayworth, Robert Mitchum and Jack Lemmon. Two friends agree to smuggle a mysterious European woman across the border, but she soon has them at each other's throats.

programme.title: Daleks Invasion Earth 2150 A.D.
programme.desc: (1966) A sci-fi classic with Peter Cushing. Dr Who travels to the future only to find the Daleks have conquered the Earth! Can he stop them nuking the planet's core? With Bernard Cribbins.

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: (2008) Remake of the sci-fi classic with Keanu Reeves. An alien visits Earth to tell humankind to stop destroying the planet. But when he's attacked, he decides to eradicate us instead...

programme.title: The Creator
programme.desc: (2023) Sci-fi extravaganza starring John David Washington. An undercover operative must destroy a superweapon in a war against AI. But the superweapon looks like a little girl.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: (2020) Groundhog day shoot 'em up with Frank Grillo, Naomi Watts and Mel Gibson. Ray gets killed every day. Can he escape by unravelling the mystery of why a bunch of people want him dead?

programme.title: Klokkenluider
programme.desc: (2022) Neil Maskell's comedy thriller with Tom Burke and Jenna Coleman. Two whistleblowers are stuck in a house with only their bickering security. And their story may not even have merit!

programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
programme.desc: (1973) Can Sinbad stop a master magician from reaching the Fountain of Destiny on the lost land of Lemuria and being crowned the new leader of Marabia?

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: (2014) Jamie Foxx stars in this reboot of the 1982 musical. Orphan Annie is transported to post-2008 recession-hit New York, where she becomes the ward of a germaphobe running for mayor.

programme.title: Steel Magnolias
programme.desc: (1989) Star-studded tragi-comedy with Julia Roberts, Daryl Hannah, Dolly Parton and more. Six Southern belles console and cajole each other through life in a Louisiana beauty parlour.

programme.title: Ex Machina Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Alex Garland and stars Domhnall Gleeson and Alicia Vikander talk about making their provocative sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: Independence Day

programme.title: Ex Machina Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Alex Garland and stars Domhnall Gleeson and Alicia Vikander talk about making their provocative sci-fi thriller.

programme.title: Terminator: Dark Fate
programme.desc: (2019) Sci-fi action sequel with Linda Hamilton and Arnold Schwarzenegger. A factory worker is targeted by deadly robot assassins from the future. Thank goodness he's back.

programme.title: Infinity Pool
programme.desc: (2023) Brandon Cronenberg's intense psychological horror with Alexander Skarsg√•rd and Mia Goth. When a rich tourist accidentally kills someone, he gets cloned to avoid the death penalty.

programme.title: Nothing To Declare
programme.desc: Officers investigate the suspicious luggage of a man returning from China and Vietnam. Drug detector dog Vulcan makes an amazing find. (S15, ep 15)

programme.title: Nothing To Declare
programme.desc: Border Force zero in on two men trying to avoid luggage checks as a search of their bags reveals why. There's a million-dollar find in the Mail Centre. (S15, ep 16)

programme.title: Nothing To Declare
programme.desc: Border Force are concerned when a man travelling from South America doesn't know the combination to open his suitcase. Officers uncover a backpack filled with drugs. (S15, ep 17)

programme.title: Nothing To Declare
programme.desc: A deadly parcel turns up at the Mail Centre. A suspicious bottle of cologne is investigated, and a couple are caught with a prohibited item that shocks Biosecurity. (S15, ep 18)

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Customs deal with a Lithuanian man who has very questionable holiday plans and a risky item lands at the International Mail Centre. (S11, ep 10)

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Biosecurity officer Jade makes an expensive witchcraft-related discovery. Also, some suspicious lampshades reach Customs. (S12, ep 1)

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Immigration discovers an attempt to establish a dangerous and illegal business in New Zealand. Meanwhile, Customs uncovers a drugs scam. (S12, ep 2)

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: Customers uncover concealed drugs. Biosecurity New Zealand find some troublesome items in a spiritual healer's luggage. (S12, ep 3)

programme.title: The Pingu Show
programme.desc: Pinga Sleepwalks / Pingu At Sledge Academy: Pingu tries to get Pinga to stop snoring so he can sleep, but then she starts sleepwalking! Pingu resists joining Sledge Academy. (S1, ep 11)

programme.title: The Pingu Show
programme.desc: Mother's New Hat / Pingu and the Braces: Pingu and Pinga must work out what to do when they ruin Mother's new hat! Pingu and Pingg play with a pair of Grandfather' braces. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Big Cats: Wild Files
programme.desc: Serval: Patrick checks out the slim and slender serval, a sneaky cat that uses its super-sensitive hearing to locate its prey. (S1, ep 8)

programme.title: Where's Wally
programme.desc: Venice the Menace: With the help of the Crystal Glass Key, Odlulu aims to become belle of the Venetian ball. But her plan ends in disaster. (S1, ep 12)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Identity Crisis: Lieutenant Geordi La Forge and another crew member are infected by an alien parasite, which is slowly transforming them into another species. (S4, Ep 18)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Nth Degree: Barclay is electrocuted while investigating an alien probe, causing the lieutenant's knowledge and self-confidence to increase dramatically. (S4, Ep 19)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Qpid: Q turns the Enterprise crew into Robin Hood and his Merry Men. Now they must save Maid Marian, who also happens to be Captain Picard's ex-girlfriend. (S4, Ep 20)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: The Drumhead: When an engineer on the Enterprise is accused of passing secrets to the Romulans, a retired admiral investigates possible sabotage and treason. (S4, Ep 21)

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Half a Life: When Lwaxana Troi falls in love with a man, her joy is shortlived when tradition dictates that he has to return home and take his own life. (S4, Ep 22)

programme.title: FILM: The Royal We
programme.desc: When her older sister elopes with a non-royal, Princess Bea must now step in and honour the arranged marriage to a small kingdom prince. (2025)

programme.title: David Attenborough's Kingdom Of Plants
programme.desc: David Attenborough explores the secret life of plants at Kew, examining everything from a huge underground specimen to a snappy carnivorous variety. (2 of 3)

programme.title: Gladiators
programme.desc: Wild Coast: Go up against Australia's wiliest gladiators and their arsenals, from a kangaroo's deadly boxing moves to the redback spider's precision-engineered traps. (S1, ep 2)

programme.title: Predators
programme.desc: Cheetah: A brotherhood of cheetahs rule the Serengeti, until a raging bushfire changes everything. Season premiere. (1 of 5)

programme.title: Agatha Raisin
programme.desc: The Deadly Dance: A scathing news article hurts Agatha's business, but then Charles' wealthy friend asks her to investigate a series of death threats. (S3, ep 2)

programme.title: Rob & Romesh Vs Country Music
programme.desc: There's more laughs as mates Rob and Romesh meet up with Shania Twain, head to Nashville and perform their very own country song. (S1, ep 5)
